lines.text: You don't have to worry about me, dear. I'm bi-sexual. Whenever I want to have sex, I have to buy it.
Congratulations, sir.
Eh, you can kiss ass later, Brittle.
Thank you, sir.
Drunk again, sir?
That's okay, Butler. So are we.
She insisted that you were adopted by a member of the working class to save you from the curse of money.
How very thoughtful...
Stop? You can't just arouse a woman and then yell stop, even if you are English...
We believe foul play was involved.
Surely you don't think I...
I don't think anything, sir. I'm a police officer.
[after the moose-head falls down from the wall over Henry Martin]
Get me out of this moose!
So many of you orphans. Unwanted children all over the place. People were sex-mad in the 60s, seemed to do it just for fun... Weird.
That's Henry's mother, the black sheep in the family. She took so many strokes in the 60s they called her the U.S. open.

[voice-over, upon learning that Rick Moranis' home burned to the ground]
I was doomed to an eternity in the fires of hell as a Christian and a horrendous rebirth as a Hindu.
You practically date-raped me
I what? I date raped you 6 TIMES!
Well, perhaps I did encourage you a bit.
A BIT!
I'm a hard man to kill.

[laughs]
Oh I know!

[talking about sex]
You called me over!
And you came. And I forgive you.

[sarcastic]
Oh how kind!
Piss off!
Bit louder there Tommy.
FUCK OFF!
Perfect!
Sex before the wedding is so much better without the groom.
